text: Columbia Pictures / Everett Collection Grooming Meet Brad Pitt ’ s Secret Weapon Jean Black, a makeup artist who never gives interviews, talks about working with Brad Pitt and his famous face for almost 30 years, and what it is that makes him so special. You've probably never heard of Jean Black but she's been behind the scenes with Brad Pitt for over 27 years, a quiet cog in the machine that is his career — and an integral part of his personal life. Black is a makeup artist who has worked with Pitt on about 30 of his films ( they recently counted it up for fun ), all of his editorial shoots, and all of his red carpet events.
